name: Drift King (itch)
description:
Drift King

Beat the record from every track and become the Drift King!
You will grow your racing ability race after race becoming faster.

The game has 3 cars with different attributes and 3 tracks with its own 5 Best timers.

:: Controls

Z = Confirm/Accelerate
X = Break
Left Click = Interact

PS:¹ Nothing is perfect, so I hope the rank doesn't fail (if it doesn't load, 
no problem, you can play normally and see your record).
PS²: Music it's not my, it's just a placeholder for fun :)!
PS³: Please use Google Chrome and disable plugins that modify web pages (like Dark header or ADblocks), it can cause bugs :).

Have Fun \o/!
